name: Wormster Dash
description:
Prepare yourself for a one-of-its-kind runner game with hidden passages, deathly traps and a dazzling fantasy world. Your task is to outrun a menacing monster you awakened when digging too deep into sacred grounds.
The whole game is hand-drawn on paper! It is a hard challenge to escape from the monster, there are no checkpoints to make life easier.
If you’re looking for a mobile game which tests your skills, provides captivating gameplay, provokes big laughs, and presents you with a distinct audio-visual experience, then Wormster Dash will surely satisfy your gaming desires!
